channel.title: JeffReyviews - Movie Reviews and Commentary
channel.description: Independent movie reviews and film commentary covering new releases, classics, and hidden gems.

item.title: F-1: The Movie
item.description: F-1: The Movie is the spiritual sequel to Tom Cruise’s Days of Thunder. It feels like it was written as the sequel for Cruise, and then they pivoted when Brad Pitt became the lead. Jerry Brockheimer worked on Days of Thunder and F-,1 and the director of F-1 also did Top Gun: Maverick, so it’s not...
item.author: jeff@jeffreyviews.com (Jeff)

item.title: Reviews: Lighting Round-April 2
item.description: Due to health reasons, I have been unable to write any full reviews lately, and I haven't been able to go out to as many movies. My apologies. I have seen a few movies, though. Here are my quick thoughts on them:AnoraR 2024 ‧ Romance/Comedy ‧ 2h 19mI finally saw this "Best Picture" winner. I was ...
item.content:encoded:
# Reviews: Lighting Round-April 2

Published: 2025-04-02T21:58:40.648Z Description: Due to health reasons, I have been unable to write any full reviews lately, and I haven't been able to go out to as many movies. My apologies. I have seen a few movies, though. Here are my quick thoughts on them:AnoraR 2024 ‧ Romance/Comedy ‧ 2h 19mI finally saw this "Best Picture" winner. I was really looking forward to it. After 15-20 minutes of the movie, I realized I wasn't liking it. I was actively disliking it. The first act of the movie is the romance section where Anora, an exotic dancer Word Count: 1 Original URL: https://www.jeffreyviews.com/post/reviews-lighting-round-april-2

]]>
item.author: jeff@jeffreyviews.com (Jeff)

item.title: The Gorge
item.description: PG-13 2025 ‧ Action/Romance 2h 7mDoes this movie live up to its title? Yes, there is a gorge.Miles Teller is an American mercenary named Levi and Anya Taylor-Joy is Drasa, a Russian sniper. Levi is hired to be the lone guard the west side of the gorge and Drasa is hired to guard the east. From wh...

item.title: Captain America: Brave New World
item.description: PG-13 2025 ‧ Action/Sci-fi ‧ 1h 58mThe Captain America franchise has consistently been my favorite of the solo Avengers movies. Brave New World is the fourth in the series and the first to feature Sam Wilson (Anthony Mackie) taking over as the new Captain America. So, I was excited to see it and ...
item.author: jeff@jeffreyviews.com (Jeff)

item.title: Emilia Pérez
item.description: R 2024 ‧ Musical/Thriller ‧ 2h 10mI appreciate it when a movie dares to be different. Emilia Pérez is different than any other movie I’ve seen and that’s my favorite part about it. Emilia Pérez is the tale of a lawyer and her client, a Mexican drug cartel leader who undergoes gender reassignment ...

item.title: Better Man
item.description: R 2024 ‧ Musical ‧ 2h 15mBefore watching Better Man, I didn’t know much about Robbie Williams. item.title: Best Movies of 2024
item.description: So far, we have seen 59 movies released in 2024. There are still a lot of award-contending movies that haven't made their way to Minnesota yet, but here is a list of the favorites that we have seen*:1. Conclave2. Wicked3. Better Man4. Civil War 5. A Complete Unknown6. The Order7. The Fall Guy8....
item.content:encoded:
# Best Movies of 2024

Published: 2025-01-13T20:06:02.397Z Description: So far, we have seen 59 movies released in 2024. There are still a lot of award-contending movies that haven't made their way to Minnesota yet, but here is a list of the favorites that we have seen*:1. Conclave2. Wicked3. Better Man4. Civil War 5. A Complete Unknown6. The Order7. The Fall Guy8. The American Society of Magical Negroes9. Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes 10. Deadpool & Wolverine I would note that 1-4 are all amazing films in their own ways, and I would put them in a tier by them Word Count: 1 Original URL: https://www.jeffreyviews.com/post/best-movies-of-2024

]]>
item.author: jeff@jeffreyviews.com (Jeff)

item.title: Gladiator II
item.description: R 2024 ‧ Action/Adventure ‧ 2h 28mGladiator won the Academy Award for Best Picture. Gladiator II will not repeat that honor, or at least it shouldn’t. item.title: Wicked
item.description: PG 2024 ‧ Musical/Fantasy ‧ 2h 40mI’m not always a big fan of movie musicals. It’s weird for people to be talking and then suddenly break into song. If a movie is a musical, it has to work a little harder for me to get into it. I was a little nervous during the first musical number with Ariana Gr...
item.author: jeff@jeffreyviews.com (Jeff)

item.title: Conclave
item.description: PG 2024 ‧ Thriller/Drama ‧ 2 hoursI’ll cut to the chase: Conclave is the best movie I’ve seen this year. item.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
item.description: As its name suggests, A Quiet Place: Day One takes place on the first day of the Quiet Place’s alien invasion. The film centers on terminally ill Sam (Lupita Nyong’o, Black Panther), who has resigned to dying and has stopped trying to enjoy life while she still can. Enticed by a promise of pizza,...

item.title: Inside Out 2
item.description: PG 2024 ‧ Family/Comedy ‧ 1h 36mInside Out 2 is set about two years after the first movie so Riley is now thirteen, entering high school and beginning puberty. The core emotions from Inside Out are back and introduced to new emotions accompanying puberty: Anxiety, Envy, Embarrassment, and Ennui. ...

item.title: 2023 Top 10 Movies
item.description: Okay, this isn’t really a new review, but there have been requests for a 2023 top 10 list. item.title: American Fiction
item.description: R 2023 Comedy/Drama 1h 57mThelonious “Monk” Ellison (Jeffrey Wright) is a disgruntled author. item.title: The Holdovers
item.description: R 2023 Comedy/Drama 2h 13mThe Holdovers is set in 1970 and was filmed to look like that’s when it was made. item.title: Saltburn
item.description: R 2023 Thriller/Comedy 2h 7mSaltburn is billed as a dark comedy/thriller. I can be down with either so I gave it a try. Cut to the chase: I hated this movie. item.title: Napoleon
item.description: R 2023 War/Action 2h 38mNapoleon was a short guy with a funny hat, lost the battle at Waterloo and was exiled at some point. item.author: jeff@jeffreyviews.com (Jeff)

item.title: The Marvels
